description:
Princess Christine von Littenheim (nee Goldenbaum) was one of the two daughters of http://anidb.net/ch206 [Emperor Friedrich IV] of the Galactic Empire. She was married to Marquis Wilhelm von Littenheim, the head of one of the most powerful high noble families, and was the mother of Sabine von Littenheim. Christine was also the sister of Princess Amarie and Crown Prince Ludwig.
Gineipedia
name: Christine von Littenheim
